properties.areaDesc: Long Island Sound West of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; New York Harbor
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 9 at 12:37AM EST until January 9 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt
expected.

* WHERE...Long Island Sound West of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson
NY and New York Harbor.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM EST early this morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
